raccoons.name: Grey
raccoons.description: Mindfulness is the basic human ability to be fully present, aware of where we are and what we’re doing, and not overly reactive or overwhelmed by what’s going on around us.
raccoons.question: Did you sleep well yesterday?

raccoons.name: Ellie
raccoons.description: Travel or mix up your routine. When you’re in a new place or routine, you automatically become more present and mindful.
raccoons.question: Was your last sleep longer than 6hr?

raccoons.name: Audrey
raccoons.description: Observe your thoughts and emotions. You are not your thoughts, but the observer of your thoughts. Be more present by not getting caught up in your thoughts.
raccoons.question: Did you eat breakfast today?

raccoons.name: John
raccoons.description: Don’t feel that you need to fill up all your time with doing. Take some time to simply be.
raccoons.question: Do you like today's weather?

raccoons.name: Roger
raccoons.description: Connect with your senses. Take the time to really experience touch, smell, taste, sound, and sight.
raccoons.question: Have you met your friend today?

raccoons.name: Snoopy
raccoons.description: Get lost in the flow of doing things you love. By pouring all your love and attention into something you’re passionate about, your smaller self - churning thoughts and worries - melt away
raccoons.question: Do you feel pain anywhere on your body?

raccoons.name: Earl
raccoons.description: Listen wholeheartedly. Often times we don’t truly listen to people because we’re too busy planning what to say, judging, or getting lost in daydream.
raccoons.question: Do you have difficulties on focusing on your work?
